title: The World's Best Mac N' Cheese
directions: Fill a saucepan with water and bring to a boil.
Add macaroni noodles and cook for approximately 8-9 minutes.
Remove from stove, strain, and transfer to a 2-quart casserole pan or other source that can be put in oven.
Add melted butter, egg, and milk, and 75% of the cheese.
Mix lightly making sure cheese is throughout macaroni.
Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top of the dish and sprinkle paprika on top for color.
Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 30 minutes. In cover for the last five minutes to brown the top.
ingredients: 1 box of elbow macaroni [or 2 cups for a smaller portion]
9 tbsp of butter, the equivalent of 1 stick [1/2 stick or 1/4 cup of butter for the smaller portion]
3 to 4 bags of shredded cheese [approx. 8 cups]
2 eggs, beaten [1 egg for a smaller portion[
